Classes/StockAPI.html#/s:ZFC11perfectMba.name: all(storeid:limit:offset:)
Classes/StockAPI.html#/s:ZFC11perfectMba.abstract: This function retrieve information about all store stock ( Product + stock). You can paginate your result.

Classes/StockAPI.html#/s:ZFC11perfectMba.name: find(storeid:productid:)
Classes/StockAPI.html#/s:ZFC11perfectMba.abstract: This function retrieve information about a store stock ( Product + stock)

Classes/StockAPI.html#/s:ZFC11perfectMba.abstract: this function provide an easy way to provide a delete on product and on stock at the same time.

Classes/StockAPI.html#/s:ZFC11perfectMba.name: count(storeid:)
Classes/StockAPI.html#/s:ZFC11perfectMba.abstract: this function is useful in the case you search for the total of instance of a store in stock table with a given id
